import React, { Component } from "react"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import "../css/MainScreen.css"; import userImg from "../img/rubyProfile.jpg"; const AdvisorInfoModal = (props) => { return ( /*

Email: ruby.elkharboutly@quinnipiac.edu
Phone: 203-123-4556
Office: CCE-030
*/ Using Grid in Modal .col-xs-12 .col-md-8 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 ); }; export default AdvisorInfoModal;
